New Records: Lassina Traoré scored a double in the first half (35th and 38th minutes)
Hassane Bandé scored the third goal for Burkina Faso (60th minute, penalty)
Zeliat Nkhoma scored Malawi's only goal (80th minute)
Key Match Events: Outstanding performance by Lassina Traoré with a double goal
Zeliat Nkhoma's late goal for Malawi
Pre-Game Insights: Burkina Faso's coach Hervé Koffi made changes to his lineup, including starting Lassina Traoré
The match was played at Stade du 26-Mars in Bamako
Post-Match Reflections: Burkina Faso's victory moved them to the top of their group ahead of Senegal based on goal difference
The team's performance was praised by their coach
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the 2025 CAN qualifiers
Burkina Faso will face Malawi again in a double confrontation in October
